original_text: Moreover the Hebrews that were with the Philistines before that time, which went up with them into the camp from the country round about, even they also turned to be with the Israelites that were with Saul and Jonathan.
korean_text: 전에 블레셋 사람들과 함께 하던 히브리 사람이 사방에서 블레셋 사람들과 함께 진영에 들어왔더니 그들이 돌이켜 사울과 요나단과 함께 한 이스라엘 사람들과 합하였고

sentences.original_text: that were with the Philistines before that time
sentences.korean_translation: 그 전에 블레셋 사람들과 함께 있었던 자들

sentences.original_text: which went up with them into the camp
that were with Saul and Jonathan
sentences.korean_translation: 사울과 요나단과 함께 있었던 이스라엘 사람들
